name: Space Attack!
description:
We're being invaded by aliens! Quick! Shoot them all before they reach you or it's game over! Oh, yeah... Don't forget to get a high score as well because... that's important!

Space Attack is a shout-out to the classic, pocket LCD games that many of you may have grown up with. The most notable example would be Nintendo's Game & Watch Series. The purpose of this first game developed by Mr. Hobbyist Games was to recreate the style, feel, sound, and arcade challenge of these classic games. It may be simple, but it packs a fun challenge that will do wonders when you need to pass some time quickly.

FEATURES:

  • Classic, arcade-action space shooter. 
  • Simple controls. Easy to pick up, challenging to master.
  • Pocket LCD-game style. Plays and feels just like a Game & Watch!
  • Unlockable Color Mode. Get a score of 500 or greater to unlock color mode.
  • XBOX gamepad support. Use a keyboard or your trusty XBOX controller.
